programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Micah, Lucas, and Mark are lost and fear they have crossed into dangerous Mexican territory. Their fears become reality when they stumble upon a ghost town and bandits take them prisoner. When Lucas sees Micah being tortured, he must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mexican bandits capture and hold Micah, Lucas, and Mark in a ghost town, Lucas devises a plan that will hopefully lead to freedom. Later, Lucas helps the wife of a bandit give birth, and the bandits finally release them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lou Mallory, a beautiful red-headed lady, arrives in North Fork and quickly buys property, including Milly Scott's general store. Lucas learns she is quite the businesswoman, until she gets into trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A stagecoach arrives in North Fork carrying two women, one of whom is gravely ill. Doc Burrage believes it's smallpox. Lou Mallory, Lucas, and both passengers quarantine alongside with another rider, Lee Coyle, a dangerous outlaw.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History
programme.desc: Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of disorderly cowhands take over the town of Kingsburg. Fear grips the townspeople. The men try to create a disturbance to cover up a bank robbery. Cheyenne, who is traveling with them, steps in to support the marshal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Buck continues to grieve over Ike's untimely death. Meanwhile, Cody falls for Julia, the widow of a gunrunner who has a young son named Danny. Cody helps them both adjust to life on their own.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While returning from a hunting trip, Lucas and Mark meet Marshal Micah Torrance who is escorting prisoner Scully Potter to trial. Later in camp, Lucas' life is suddenly in danger when a rattlesnake is found in his bedroll. Potter tries to escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: For months, a thin wall of rock is all that keeps the peace between two rival silver mining companies 300 feet below the Idaho desert. When the barrier is finally breached, pickaxes give way to pistols and rifles, and the miners battle for five days.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Christmas in Maple Hills
programme.desc: Valerie Warrick is shocked to learn that her family's land is registered to a mysterious D Property Company. Days before Christmas, she teams with a handsome travelling doctor to unravel the mystery to her family's past and her heart's future.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?
